page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content:
The staff and pupils of St.Thomas More school wish to thank the following people, without whose help this part of the Domesday project would have been very difficult:
I.C.I.Mond Division, in particular, Mr. John Owen and Mr. Bob Clark, who made special arrangements to allow us to visit Tunstead quarry.
Miss Wendy Fearn of Pictor Hall Farm. Mr.& Mrs John Mellor of Woolow Farm. Mr.& Mrs Richard Morten of Cowdale Hall Farm. Mr.& Mrs Fotherby of Tunstead Farm. Mr.Beswick of Daisymere Farm. Mr.J.W.Lomas of Cowlow Farm.
